item.title: Kiara Advani Advised Rest Due to Exertion, Misses Game Changer Event with Ram Charan - News18
item.description:
Kiara Advani Takes a Break Due to Exhaustion, Misses Game Changer Event

Date: January 04, 2025

Source: News18

Actress Kiara Advani, set to star alongside Ram Charan in the film Game Changer, is currently resting at home following advice to recover from exhaustion after a busy schedule.

  • Ian a surprising turn, Kiara was initially reported to be hospitalized, but her spokesperson clarified she is at home resting.
  • Her absence was noted at a promotional event for Game Changer, generating concern among fans.
  • The film, directed by Shankar, is set to release on January 10, 2025.
  • Game Changer has completed its censorship formalities and received a U/A certificate from the CBFC.
“Kiara Advani has not been hospitalised, she’s been advised to rest due to exertion as she’s been working non-stop,” said the actress’ spokesperson.

The upcoming film Game Changer has created significant buzz and features an impressive cast, including Ram Charan, making it one of the most anticipated releases of the month.

item.title: Aubrey Plaza’s husband, director Jeff Baena, 47, dies by suicide - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aubrey Plaza's Husband Jeff Baena Dies by Suicide at Age 47

Date: January 04, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Aubrey Plaza is mourning the loss of her husband, film director Jeff Baena, who was found dead in his Los Angeles home at the age of 47. Local authorities are currently investigating the circumstances surrounding his passing.

  • Jeff Baena was discovered dead by his assistant, prompting a police investigation.
  • Aubrey Plaza's representatives stated that the family is devastated and requests privacy.
  • The couple married in 2021 and had no children.
  • Baena's notable works include Joshy, Horse Girl, and co-writing I Heart Huckabees.
  • Plaza mentioned their spontaneous wedding during an appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show.
“The family is devastated and asks for privacy at this difficult time.”

This story is still developing as details emerge about Jeff Baena's death.

item.title: Janhvi Kapoor visits Tirumala Temple with rumoured boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Janhvi Kapoor Visits Tirumala Temple with Rumoured Boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya

Date: Jan 04, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood actor Janhvi Kapoor visited the Tirumala Temple to seek blessings, accompanied by her rumored boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya. She greeted her fans while leaving the temple and is set to star in the upcoming film 'Param Sundari'.

  • Janhvi wore a purple saree during her visit.
  • She was surrounded by security and fans.
  • Upcoming movie 'Param Sundari' is a cross-cultural love story with Sidharth Malhotra, releasing on July 25, 2025.
  • First-look posters of the film have been shared on social media.
“North ka swag, South ki grace - two worlds collide and spark fly.”

The visit highlights Janhvi Kapoor's connection to her fans and her upcoming cinematic projects.

item.title: Aubrey Plaza said she was 'proud' of husband Jeff Baena in last Instagram post before his death - The Mirror US
item.description:
Aubrey Plaza said she was 'proud' of husband in last post before his death

Publication Date: Unknown, Source: The Mirror

Aubrey Plaza expressed her love and pride for her husband Jeff Baena in an Instagram post just before his untimely death at 47.

  • Jeff Baena was found dead in their Los Angeles home on Friday.
  • Aubrey's last Instagram post in May 2021 highlighted her pride in Jeff's movie projects.
  • Tributes from fans and friends have flooded social media in response to the news.
“So proud of my darling husband @jeffbaena for dreaming up another film that takes us to Italia to cause some more trouble.”

This tragic event has left many heartbroken, including Aubrey's friends and fans who are expressing their condolences.

item.title: Horoscope For Each Zodiac Sign On January 5, 2025 — The Moon Squares Mercury - YourTango
item.description:
Horoscope For Each Zodiac Sign On January 5, 2025 — The Moon Squares Mercury

Date: January 5, 2025
Source: YourTango

Today's horoscope for each zodiac sign highlights the Moon in Pisces squaring Mercury in Sagittarius, creating emotional tensions and encouraging introspection during this cosmic alignment.

item.title: Shankar sir is the first pan-India director – Ram Charan at Game Changer’s Mumbai event - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan Celebrates Shankar as India's First Pan-India Director at Game Changer Event

Published on Jan 3, 2025 12:40 pm IST

Maverick Kollywood director Shankar’s highly anticipated pan-India political drama, Game Changer, is set to release on January 10 as a Sankranthi festive treat. Actor Ram Charan and producer Dil Raju participated in the film’s promotional event in Mumbai.

  • Game Changer features a star-studded cast including Kiara Advani and SJ Suryah.
  • Ram Charan praised Shankar as a pioneer of pan-India cinema.
  • Charan highlighted the intense attention to detail and high expectations of directors Shankar and Rajamouli.
  • The film is produced by Dil Raju and directed by Shankar.
“Shankar sir is an epitome of commercial films. He defined larger-than-life cinema and global cinema.” – Ram Charan

The event emphasizes the significance of Shankar's contributions to Indian cinema and the anticipation for Game Changer's release.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 31: Allu Arjun movie’s gold rush normalises, mints ₹3.45 crore on Saturday | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Box Office Collection Day 31: Allu Arjun movie’s gold rush normalises, mints ₹3.45 crore on Saturday

Publication Date: October 7, 2023

Source: Live Mint

After entering the fifth week, Tollywood movie Pushpa: The Rule's box office performance saw a slight decrease on Friday but gained traction again on Saturday, earning ₹3.45 crore.

  • Total domestic Box Office collection reached ₹1196.95 crore.
  • The movie maintained a Telugu occupancy of 13.48%, Hindi occupancy of 13.61%, and Tamil occupancy of 19.37%.
  • In 28 days, the movie grossed ₹1,799 crores worldwide.
  • Notable earnings include ₹57.95 crore in Week 4, with significant contributions each day.
“800 NOT OUT… #Pushpa2 is all set to inaugurate the ₹800 cr Club... The #AlluArjun starrer has amassed a huge ₹57.95 cr in Week 4, setting a new benchmark.” - Taran Adarsh

The film, directed by Sukumar, continues to break records and is positioned as the second highest grosser of Indian cinema.

item.title: Raveena Tandon would have married Govinda if she met him first, shares his wife: ‘Le jaa, pata chalega tujhe’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Raveena Tandon Would Have Married Govinda, Reveals His Wife

Publication Date: Not specified Source: The Indian Express

Govinda's wife, Sunita Ahuja, shares anecdotes about the actor's busy filming schedule in the 1990s and recalls Raveena Tandon's humorous remark about their past.

  • Govinda was an extremely busy actor in the 1990s, signing 75 films and working on multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Sunita Ahuja balanced her responsibilities with their daughter, Tina, during Govinda's absences.
  • Sunita described her friendship with Raveena Tandon and Shilpa Shetty during outdoor shoots.
  • Raveena often jokingly said she would have married Govinda if she had met him earlier.
  • Sunita humorously responded to Raveena's comment about taking Govinda away.
“Raveena still says ‘Chichi tu mujhe pehle milta toh main tere se shadi karti’ (Chichi, if I met you earlier, I would have married you). I told her ‘Le ja, pata chalega tereko’ (Take him away, and you will get to know).”

Sunita also expressed her admiration for Govinda's on-screen pairings, particularly with Raveena and Karisma Kapoor.

item.title: Game Changer gets a 2-week ticket hike in AP; Govt issues G.O. - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer gets a 2-week ticket hike in AP; Govt issues G.O.

Published on Jan 4, 2025 7:30 pm IST

As the release of the political drama 'Game Changer' approaches, the Andhra Pradesh government has approved a hike in ticket prices to boost its box office prospects.

  • The Andhra Pradesh government approved a ticket hike: Rs 135 at single screens and Rs 175 at multiplexes.
  • The film will feature multiple shows, with up to 6 shows on its release day, January 10.
  • Benefit shows will be priced at Rs 600 per ticket.
  • From January 11, it will have 5 daily shows until January 23.
  • 'Game Changer' stars Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, among others.

item.title: Squid Game Season 2: All Dead, Alive Characters LISTED. Who Will Return In Season 3? - Times Now
item.description:
Squid Game Season 2: All Dead, Alive Characters LISTED. Who Will Return In Season 3?

Publication Date: (not specified)
Source: (not specified)

Squid Game Season 2 was filled with intense moments, unexpected deaths, and cliffhangers, leading viewers to speculate about character fates ahead of Season 3.

Key Points:

  • List of characters who died in Season 2 including Mr. Kim, The Salesman, and others.
  • Overview of surviving characters like Gi-hun and Dae-ho who will return in Season 3.
  • Character Gyeong-seok's ambiguous fate sparks theories about his potential survival.
“Gyeong-seok enters to win some money for the treatment of his daughter.”

This season has left fans eagerly awaiting further developments and character returns in Season 3.

item.title: 'When I got to know Adrija Roy is new Raahi..': Anupamaa's Spreha Chatterjee on actress being roped in show - India Forums
item.description:
‘When I got to know Adrija Roy is new Raahi..': Anupamaa's Spreha Chatterjee on actress being roped in show

Published: Saturday, January 4, 2025 at 1:34 PM

Spreha Chatterjee, who plays Maahi in Star Plus' Anupamaa, speaks about Adrija Roy replacing Alisha Parveen on the show.

  • Spreha expressed her surprise and pleasure upon learning that Adrija Roy was the one replacing Raahi.
  • She described her first meeting with Adrija on set, highlighting the positive atmosphere and openness of the team.
  • Adrija Roy took over the role following Alisha Parveen's ousting due to performance issues.
  • Adrija made a statement on the audience's attachment to characters and the adjustment period required when replacements are made.

First I got to know that Raahi is being replaced and when I got to know it is Adrija so obviously aap jab kisi ko jaante ho toh lagta hai chalo koi aisa insaan aaraha hai jisse main mil chuki hoon, kaam kar chuki hoon, toh acha laga ke Adrija show mein aarahi hai

- Spreha Chatterjee

This shift in casting is significant as it reflects the challenges actors face in gaining audience acceptance in established roles.

item.title: Janhvi Kapoor kicks off 2025 with her alleged boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya, seeking blessings at Tirupati - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Janhvi Kapoor Kicks Off 2025 with Her Alleged Boyfriend Shikhar Pahariya, Seeking Blessings at Tirupati

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Times of India

Janhvi Kapoor started 2025 on a heartwarming note, seeking blessings at the Tirupati temple with her alleged boyfriend, Shikhar Pahariya, and his mother. Their visit, shared on social media, radiated positivity and warmth.

  • Janhvi shared the moment on her social media platforms.
  • The couple's visit has captivated fans and received a viral response.
  • Shikhar recently posted a 'New Year photo dump' featuring Janhvi and reflected on his intentions for 2025.
“Grateful for all that I could be, for all that I could see, and all that I could do. Praying for more strength, foresight, wisdom, and opportunity going into 2025—to serve those who need it most...” - Shikhar Pahariya

This visit highlights the actress's humble approach to the new year, showcasing a personal and spiritual side that resonates with fans.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai gets concerned after Aaradhya Bachchan suddenly..., asks 'Who pushed...' - Watch viral video - India.com
item.description:
Aishwarya Rai gets concerned after Aaradhya Bachchan suddenly..., asks 'Who pushed...' - Watch viral video

Date: January 2, 2025 Source: India.com

Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai returned to Mumbai after a New Year’s holiday with their daughter, Aaradhya. A viral video of Aishwarya Rai asking Aaradhya about an incident at the airport has caught public attention.

  • The Bachchan family was spotted together at Mumbai Airport.
  • Aishwarya expressed concern when Aaradhya seemed startled, asking, “Who pushed you?”
  • Despite rumors about their marriage, the family's public appearance highlighted their close bond.
  • Fans appreciated the grounded nature of both Aishwarya and Abhishek during their interactions with the media.
“Happy New Year, God bless,” Aishwarya wished the paparazzi while smiling.

The family continues to maintain a strong public image, reassuring fans of their unity amid ongoing speculations.

item.title: 4 Zodiac Signs Receive Signs From The Universe On January 5, 2025 - YourTango
item.description:
Four Zodiac Signs Receive Signs From The Universe On January 5, 2025

Publication Date: January 5, 2025 | Source: YourTango

On January 5, 2025, four zodiac signs—Aries, Leo, Scorpio, and Sagittarius—are expected to receive significant signs from the universe, particularly influenced by the Aries Moon.

  • **Aries**: Feels strong and directed, receiving clear signs of success.
  • **Leo**: Experiences a surge of positivity and confidence, attracting good fortune.
  • **Scorpio**: Recognizes opportunities and activates plans, sharing joy with friends.
  • **Sagittarius**: Gains control over stress, resulting in a positive outlook and anticipation of future success.
“You’ve got something immense to look forward to, and it's coming very soon.”

The day emphasizes activation, confidence, and collaboration among the zodiac signs, suggesting a universal synchronicity that encourages taking action towards goals.

item.title: BIGBANG Taeyang's Instagram Bombarded With "BTS Paved The Way" Comments After Hotly Debated Interview - Koreaboo
item.description:
BIGBANG Taeyang's Instagram Bombarded With 'BTS Paved The Way' Comments After Hotly Debated Interview

Date: 8 hours ago | Source: Koreaboo

BIGBANG star Taeyang has sparked a heated debate online following a recent interview with CNN, where he discussed the impact of K-Pop. His comments led to a wave of remarks on Instagram, particularly emphasizing that BTS paved the way for K-Pop's success.

  • Taeyang spoke about K-Pop's global rise in an interview with CNN.
  • Comments on his Instagram posts have focused on BTS's contributions to the industry.
  • Fans of BIGBANG have mobilized to support Taeyang amid backlash.
  • Comments included Taeyang's sentiment about BIGBANG's role in opening global markets for K-Pop.
“Thankfully, we were able to open doors to global markets for many K-Pop bands that came after us. And they can perform on world stages. I wouldn’t say we presented that, but it feels great that our efforts have played a part in that.”
— Taeyang

In summary, Taeyang's recent interview has incited mixed reactions, with his fans defending him against critics who highlight BTS's role in K-Pop history.

item.title: Himesh Reshammiya starrer Badass Ravi Kumar recovers Rs. 20 cr cost even before release - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Himesh Reshammiya's Badass Ravi Kumar Recovers Rs. 20 Crore Before Release

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Bollywood Hungama

Himesh Reshammiya’s film, Badass Ravi Kumar, has successfully recovered its cost of Rs. 20 crore before its release, demonstrating innovative financial strategies employed by the filmmakers.

  • The film's production budget has been fully covered by music rights and subsidies from Oman.
  • The music for the film has reportedly generated Rs. 16 crore, while subsidies added another Rs. 4 crore.
  • Additively, the film's marketing cost of Rs. 4 crore is also expected to be recouped through various rights.
  • Set in the 1980s, the film channels the aesthetic of classic movies, with meticulous planning to avoid overspending.
  • Himesh Reshammiya has adopted a profit-sharing model for his role as a composer, singer, and actor.
“I am on a profit sharing deal in this film and haven’t charged for my music... we have very meticulously planned this movie for over a year so that there is no wastage at all.” - Himesh Reshammiya

With the motion poster and trailer generating strong interest, Badass Ravi Kumar is set to release on February 7.

item.title: Exclusive - Anupamaa: Rupali Ganguly reacts to reports of her quitting the show; says 'I opened the gate, - The Times of India
item.description:
Rupali Ganguly Addresses Rumors of Quitting Anupamaa, Affirms Commitment to the Show

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

Rupali Ganguly responds to recent rumors regarding her departure from the popular show Anupamaa, clarifying her emotional connection and unwavering commitment to the series.

  • Rumors surfaced about a potential 15-year leap in the storyline, causing speculation about Ganguly's exit.
  • Ganguly shared a heartfelt message emphasizing that Anupamaa is her home and she will not leave the show.
  • Producers Deepa Shahi and Rajan Shahi confirmed that the rumors are false and reaffirmed the show's dedication to real emotions.
  • Ganguly encouraged fans to continue supporting the show and assured them of its continuity.
“Anupamaa is not just a show for me; it's an emotion, it's my home.” - Rupali Ganguly

With her deep connection to the show and commitment to its future, Rupali Ganguly reassures fans that Anupamaa will continue to thrive.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Salman Khan confronts Chahat Pandey over her mom's remarks against Avinash Mishra; host sha - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Salman Khan confronts Chahat Pandey over her mom's remarks against Avinash Mishra; host shares personal photos, hinting at her love life

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The upcoming Weekend Ka Vaar episode of Bigg Boss 18 is set to be packed with intense drama as host Salman Khan addresses important topics surrounding Chahat Pandey and her mother's comments about Avinash Mishra.

  • Chahat Pandey's mother criticized Avinash Mishra for derogatory remarks about her daughter.
  • Salman Khan challenges Chahat about her mother’s statements and shares a personal photo to provoke her.
  • Avinash demands Chahat acknowledge her relationship based on the shared anniversary photo.
  • Kashish Kapoor apologizes to Salman for her behavior in the previous episode.
“Your mother has given you a character certificate, letting the world know what type of guy you like.” - Salman Khan

As the tension unfolds, viewers are left wondering if Chahat will admit to her relationship or deny it. The episode promises to deliver significant drama and revelations in the ongoing Bigg Boss season.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18 Weekend Ka Vaar: Salman Khan exposes Chaahat Pandey’s secret relationship; netizens have mixed r - Bollywood Life
item.description:
Salman Khan Reveals Chaahat Pandey's Secret Relationship on Bigg Boss 18

Published: January 4, 2025 3:42 PM IST | Source: BollywoodLife

The drama intensifies as Bigg Boss 18 approaches its finale, with emotional family reunions and shocking revelations. Salman Khan shocks Chaahat Pandey by exposing her secret boyfriend, leading to a widespread reaction from netizens.

  • Contestants met family members, sparking emotional moments.
  • Chaahat's mother claimed her daughter was a 'saint' in front of Avinash Mishra.
  • Salman Khan revealed Chaahat’s secret boyfriend, leaving her distressed.
  • A promo showed a cake featuring a couple sticker, confirming the relationship.
  • Netizens criticized the show's makers for invading Chaahat's privacy.
“We love you #ChahatPandey, aise logo ko ignore Karo yeh shameless salman or makers insaniyat k naam pe kalank hai, I STAND WITH #ChahatPandey.”

Bigg Boss 18: Weekend Ka Vaar airs on Colors TV, adding to the show's peak drama moments.

item.title: Coldplay faces a legal notice ahead of their Ahmedabad concert: ‘Cannot use children in any form on the s - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Coldplay Faces Legal Notice for Upcoming Ahmedabad Concert

Date: N/A Source: N/A

Coldplay's upcoming concert is under scrutiny due to concerns regarding the use of children on stage and sound levels that could harm young audiences.

  • Legal notice issued by the District Child Protection Unit to Coldplay and organizers.
  • Children are not allowed on stage or in the venue without hearing protection.
  • Sound levels must not exceed 120 decibels to protect children’s health.
  • Concern raised by Pandit Rao Dharnevar regarding potential harm to children.
  • Previous actions taken against other performers for similar concerns.
“Certain songs make uncivilized and barbaric impressions on the minds of young children.” – Pandit Rao Dharnevar

This notice highlights ongoing concerns about children's rights and safety during large public events.

item.title: Sky Force New Trailer First Review: Akshay's Updated Movie Trailer Guarantees 'Goosebumps'; Glimpse Drops On.. - Filmibeat
item.description:
Sky Force New Trailer First Review:

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Filmibeat

As we enter 2025, Akshay Kumar is gearing up for his first release of the year with 'Sky Force'. Directed by Sandeep Kewlani and Abhishek Kapur, the patriotic war drama is set to paint the theatres with patriotism this Republic Day.

  • The trailer of 'Sky Force' is scheduled for release on January 5, 2025.
  • Accordig to the team, this film highlights India's first and deadliest airstrike.
  • The trailer launch event will take place in Mumbai, with unclear details on attendee confirmations.
  • Initial trailer was scrapped due to updates, promising an exhilarating new version.
  • Starring Akshay Kumar alongside Sara Ali Khan, Veer Pahariya, and Nimrat Kaur.
#Exclusive .. Just watched the updated new trailer of #AkshayKumar𓃵 starrer #SkyForce ..
@MaddockFilms just scrapped the initial trailer.. Oh man, this new #SkyforceTrailer is just mesmerizing with stunning visuals... Goosebumps while watching it..🔥🔥🔥.
Worth waiting for it. (sic)

'Sky Force' is expected to hit cinemas on Republic Day 2025.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 30: Allu Arjun Inaugurates The 800 Crore Club, Set To Create History In Week 5 By Defeating Stree 2? - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 30: Allu Arjun Inaugurates The 800 Crore Club, Set To Create History In Week 5

Publication Date: Recent

Source: Koimoi

The Hindi-dubbed version of Pushpa 2 has reached a remarkable milestone by entering the 800 crore club within just 30 days of its release, becoming the highest-grossing Hindi film ever.

  • The film broke multiple box office records since its opening.
  • It has surpassed major competitors like Jawan and Stree 2 in earnings.
  • On its 30th day, it earned an estimated 3 crores, reaching a total of 801.20 crores at the Indian box office.
  • This achievement marks it as the first film to enter the 800 crore club with Hindi collections.
  • Pushpa 2 aims to set new records in its upcoming fifth week.
“This is a huge achievement, and it won’t be easy to enjoy such madness at the Indian box office in the coming future.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's success at the box office sets the stage for future milestones in similar cinematic ventures, creating a new benchmark for Indian films.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule box office collection: Allu Arjun film clocks blockbuster month, inches closer to ₹1200 cr mark - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule Box Office Collection Day 31

Date: Jan 04, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The Allu Arjun-led film Pushpa 2 has been a box office sensation since its release on December 5, raking in impressive earnings and breaking records.

  • The film has grossed ₹1198.1 crore as it approaches the ₹1200 crore milestone.
  • On its 31st day, the box office collection was ₹3.45 crore.
  • Opening weekend collection was ₹725.8 crore, with subsequent weeks showing consistent performance.
  • Despite new film releases, Pushpa 2 remains a top choice for audiences.
“Pushpa 2 has broken several records so far and is inching towards the ₹1200 crore mark.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2 continues to demonstrate incredible box office success and audience loyalty even after weeks in theaters.

item.title: ‘Har founder ko influencer banne ka kida aa gaya’: Vineeta Singh’s quick-witted reply to Gaurav Taneja’s remark - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Vineeta Singh Responds Witty to Gaurav Taneja’s Influencer Remark on Shark Tank India

Date: January 04, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The trailer for the fourth season of Shark Tank India features a playful banter between Vineeta Singh and Gaurav Taneja, showcasing the excitement and drama to come in the new season.

  • The new season of Shark Tank India is set to air on January 8, 2025, introducing new investors and exciting pitches.
  • Gaurav Taneja is a notable participant pitching his whey protein brand, having achieved ₹1 crore in sales in just one hour.
  • The promotional video highlights the unique exchange where Singh responds cleverly to Taneja’s remark about founders wanting to be influencers.
  • The show is expected to feature diverse entrepreneurs from various backgrounds, including those from smaller towns and villages.
  • Some entrepreneurs propose bold valuations, leading to surprised reactions from the investors.
“Shark, Aaj kal har founder ko influencer banne ka kida aa gya hai.” - Gaurav Taneja
“Aur influencer ko founder banne ka.” - Vineeta Singh

This upcoming season promises to be filled with innovation, talent, and compelling stories from aspiring entrepreneurs.

item.title: SkyForce motion poster out featuring Akshay Kumar and debutant Veer Pahariya; trailer to release on January 5 - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
SkyForce Motion Poster Out Featuring Akshay Kumar and Debutant Veer Pahariya; Trailer to Release on January 5

Publication Date: January 4, 2025
Source: Bollywood Hungama

The highly anticipated motion poster of SkyForce has been revealed, showcasing a narrative steeped in courage and dedication. The trailer is set to launch at a major event tomorrow.

  • The film features Akshay Kumar and newcomer Veer Pahariya.
  • It is inspired by India's first deadly airstrike.
  • Set during the Indo-Pak conflicts of the 1960s-70s.
  • The film will release in theaters on January 24, 2025.
  • Other cast members include Sara Ali Khan, Nimrat Kaur, and Sharad Kelkar.
“I’m incredibly grateful to everyone who worked on Skyforce. The film was definitely a challenging one to bring to life, but it’s the dedication of the crew that made it possible.” - Sandeep Kewlani

This film promises action sequences choreographed by Craig Macrae, renowned for his expertise in stunt coordination.
